title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 58.4 - Reactors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 58.4 - Reactors

State Regulations

Reactors to the tuberculin test shall be promptly
segregated from the herd; and, after their removal from the herd, the infected
premises shall be thoroughly cleaned and disinfected in a manner satisfactory
to the State and Federal Bureaus of Animal Industry. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
58.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
